gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 126, Hawks, 116
gameRecap.excerpt: Joel Embiid tallied his fourth consecutive and his seventh 30+ point game of the year as he led Philadelphia with 32 points, eight assists, and seven rebounds in a 126-116 victory over Atlanta. Tobias Harris (29 points, 10 rebounds) and Tyrese Maxey (19 points, 8 assists) totaled 48 points for the 76ers. Trae Young led Atlanta with 22 points and 13 assists in the loss.  The 76ers improve to 9-3 on the year and 2-1 in East Group A play as the Hawks move to 6-6 in the regular season and 1-1 in East Group A play
